content: Goal 1: Go to trello.com (or a similar Kanban demo), create a new board called 'Agent Test'. Add three cards: 'Research', 'Design', and 'Deploy'. Attach a screenshot of the Playwright homepage to the 'Research' card.
Goal 2: move the 'Design' card to a new column called 'In Progress'.
Goal 3: verify the board's URL and title are correct and delete the 'Deploy' card.
